Html:
Hey there,

I have to visualize a Traceroute with different hops from a startpoint (source) to an endpoint (sink).

I have 75 Vertices and 216 edges. The Problem is (regardless which Tree Generation Algorithm I use to create the Tree) the start node is on the left side, the end node is in the middle and 40 nodes are on the right side.

I need something like that:

.

In addition the layout overlap removal algorithms also take no effect.

Thanks in advance :-)

Regards
Markus
Attach a picture how the wrong layout looks like.

Should I use another graph than the BidirectionalGraph?
